column4: hi, I have config my dad phone to be use as modem by his ubuntu using wvdial. its working fine except that I have to run sudo wvdial on the terminal which my dad dont want that I plan to create a luncher but how will I pass the password in my command?
you can make sudo use a file for input and put the password in that file.. (NB!.. cleartext password in a file isn't a good thing)
seems like you'll have to compile vloopback yourself
if the ubuntu forum threads I've found are accurate
